title: Outhue
author: Outhue
content: Is it possible to stick with free spins on online casinos and still be able to make some good reward? I am looking into the free side of things, no risk at all with free spins but the question is has anyone ever make something out of free spins before? Something reasonable at? The last time I earned something free from gambling websites was when BTC has very low value and many faucets still run, that's couple of years back.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: It depend on how the free spin is, how difficult it is and how lucky you are. It also depends on how many freespin you have, if it is one, more than one or very many. I have earned over $30 before in free spins, I have earned $4 before, there are even ones that I earned northing. But free spin should not be what we should so consider like the luck of life.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: Outhue on November 18, 2022, 09:11:57 AMIs it possible to stick with free spins on online casinos and still be able to make some good reward? I am looking into the free side of things, no risk at all with free spins but the question is has anyone ever make something out of free spins before? Something reasonable at? The last time I earned something free from gambling websites was when BTC has very low value and many faucets still run, that's couple of years back. If I got this right you are asking if anything good can be won from the free spins.Most providers like Play n Go and others is exactly at these free spins that they incorporated the game play mechanics to make you win considerable amounts even with the lowest bet,mostly they use different multipliers to make your bet 0.10 dollars look 10 dollars during these free spins with x100 multiplier.The only problem is though that you have to play a lot of times and to get a lot of times these free spins in order to come out with any big reasonable win.This only happens rarely but when it does happen it brings you considerable profit depending on the amount of bet that you are playing.

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: You could win thru free spins but never expect big profit and aldo, would be hard to make a 'living' out of your slightest chance to win. Also, in some casinos, you have to deposit first in order to withdraw your winnings. There are also instances wherein the reward  in free spins are different from the huge rewards in the actual game. Ofcourse, the house won't allow players who haven't paid a single cent to win huge amount. Those free spins will just be promotions in order to attract players in a certain gambling platform. I'd be more glad of huge bonuses in special ocassions than free spins because that would be more enjoyed by players who invested in a platform.

comments.author: mindrust
comments.body: Quote from: Outhue on November 18, 2022, 09:11:57 AMIs it possible to stick with free spins on online casinos and still be able to make some good reward? I am looking into the free side of things, no risk at all with free spins but the question is has anyone ever make something out of free spins before? Something reasonable at? The last time I earned something free from gambling websites was when BTC has very low value and many faucets still run, that's couple of years back. I've been getting free WoF spins from freebitco.in and a few times I got 5000 rw/tickets and btc till now. I'd say freespins on freebitco.in works. It may not work on the other casinos but freebitco.in is legit. I am actually making money from those spins and taking money from the casino. I have no idea how they are sustaining this because this must be one of the most generous casino ever existed and still in business after like 6 or 7+ years.

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: Quote from: Outhue on November 18, 2022, 09:11:57 AMIs it possible to stick with free spins on online casinos and still be able to make some good reward? Still depends on luck though, even in land based casinos, free spins will not equate into good rewards.So yes, you can still win with free spins, but your luck will still have the last say.I can't remember when was the last time I earn something free, oh wait, yeah, got a free spin or free bet when my account got upgraded on another gambling site. So it's either I take the free and make it cash or go and bet that as free.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: it's highly unlikely that you'd win a big amount but yeah, it is possible to get "good rewards"(it also depends o. How much do you think is a good reward). Stay around here in the forum for a while and you might see some gamblers posting about their wins with free spins. Just curious, is this thread just for free spins? Because freebitco.in have an hourly faucet in which you have a chance of getting up to several amount of mbtc just from the faucet.

comments.author: Findingnemo
comments.body: Quote from: Outhue on November 18, 2022, 09:11:57 AMIs it possible to stick with free spins on online casinos and still be able to make some good reward? I am looking into the free side of things, no risk at all with free spins but the question is has anyone ever make something out of free spins before? Something reasonable at? The last time I earned something free from gambling websites was when BTC has very low value and many faucets still run, that's couple of years back. Yes, it is possible to win and for that you only need the luck but tonnes of it.Now many casinos have restrictions because people are abusing the bonus and promotions so users have to be wagered a minimum amount then only they can able to withdraw the rewards from casinos.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: Quote from: Outhue on November 18, 2022, 09:11:57 AMIs it possible to stick with free spins on online casinos and still be able to make some good reward? I am looking into the free side of things, no risk at all with free spins but the question is has anyone ever make something out of free spins before? Something reasonable at? The last time I earned something free from gambling websites was when BTC has very low value and many faucets still run, that's couple of years back. It's possible but I have not done it yet. All my free spins before were unlucky and I don't want to stay on that kind of hobby where you are just waiting to be given freebies, I'd rather deposit and play the game and try my luck. The difference is you are more careful when it's your money that is on the line. It changes the way you view gambling so eventually profits will come. As long as you can keep that kind of discipline then you might get lucky one day but I've never heard a story of a gambler having good rewards whose initial capital is from faucets and free spins.

comments.author: Bitinity
comments.body: Quote from: Outhue on November 18, 2022, 09:11:57 AMIs it possible to stick with free spins on online casinos and still be able to make some good reward? I am looking into the free side of things, no risk at all with free spins but the question is has anyone ever make something out of free spins before? Something reasonable at? The last time I earned something free from gambling websites was when BTC has very low value and many faucets still run, that's couple of years back. I made it in Fortunejack long time ago, they gave players free spins regularly and I won it once or twice I cant remember it correctly. It is possible to win from free spins but it needs a big luck because the hardest thing is to complete the wagering requirement of the free spins. However free spins that completely free is now rare to find, most casinos are now giving it to active players only because many people tried to abuse it. Means that you cant stick with free spins only on online casinos if you are not even playing with your own money and become active players.

comments.author: gantez
comments.body: I understand the area of op post. I think also that free spin is difficult for me to win big. Sometime I got free spin to play but I couldn't win after the first fraction of mbtc win. I have some chance to play 3 times and reduced the staking to lower my risk but that didn't safe me after I was happy winning first spin. I think free spin is not always lucky for me.

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: Of course you can, but with an unpredictable value, because it all depends on luck, usually FreeSpin is very limited, only given a few 10, 20 or even below that if there is no luck then you will only get a few cents because sometimes with hundreds of spins players only get a few dollars so it really all depends on the player's luck, but because it's free, it doesn't matter in my opinion whatever you get.

comments.author: Queentoshi
comments.body: Quote from: Outhue on November 18, 2022, 09:11:57 AMIs it possible to stick with free spins on online casinos and still be able to make some good reward? The purpose of Free spins are to encourage you to play and introduce you to the games, it is very possible to win something reasonable with them that will encourage you the want to come back to play again. Free spins are the same as playing with some money it is just that the casino awards them to you as bonuses, and although some people may not value them because they were gotten freely, It doesn't make them in any way useless or worthless.

Blackjack.fun is the only casino that offers this kind free spin before that give you an actual reward without any risk involved because you can earn free spin just by voting or chatting but right now they already add wagering requirements rules before you can get the rewards on free spin. The feature that you are looking for is very rare and you can only see free spins like this on  new casino promotion for attracting new user purposes.Instead of free spin. Just participate on Sportsbet and Bitcasino prediction contest on game and rounds board for a risk free bets. It's more worth it than free spins.

comments.author: Wind_FURY
comments.body: Quote from: Outhue on November 18, 2022, 09:11:57 AMIs it possible to stick with free spins on online casinos and still be able to make some good reward? I don't know how much is "some good reward" for you, but YES, you can still win with free spins.That's from playing a slot machine called Dig Dig Digger from BGaming, it's also called Diggy's Narnia, Diggy's Hole bring lotion, or Diggy's Scatter by the BlackJack.Fun community. In that screenshot, Diggy gave me 1.35 mBTC just from free spins. It's not a jackpot of thousands of dollars, but I believe it's good enough considering that it's merely from free spins.

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: Yes of course you can win big I see free spin like playing a game with a friend and he says am a pro in this game if you can win me take this money,if you win he gives you and if you don't win then you get nothing. Free spins are used to lure gamblers into gambling in their casinos, they also use this for promotions in other to satisfy their customers and some gamblers that don't have funds for gambling but have interest.As you know gambling is about luck so if you are lucky on that freespin and  win big nobody will deprive you from your funds even the casinos because they know it will make their customers not trust them and this will not bring good reputation of the casino. OP if you don't have anything to gamble with then you can continue with your free spin maybe someday you might win big

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: It is absolutely possible to win from free spins that you win during your game play session in your favorite slot.It is simple to see quite a lot of people,mostly streamers and addicted gamblers that have won extremely big amounts in just a mere 5-20 free spins.For this you just need to check in google search and write the name of your favorite slot by adding also big win for example "the green knight slot big wins" and this will show you quite some result of people winning big from a mere 5 free spins.Also as I said above for these guys to happen such winnings they have played for several hours,we cannot just play one hour or two hours and hope to get such results,I have tried myself in such time frame yet I have never been in such high multipliers such as those in these videos.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: Quote from: Outhue on November 18, 2022, 09:11:57 AMIs it possible to stick with free spins on online casinos and still be able to make some good reward? I am looking into the free side of things, no risk at all with free spins but the question is has anyone ever make something out of free spins before? Something reasonable at? The last time I earned something free from gambling websites was when BTC has very low value and many faucets still run, that's couple of years back. It will depend on how good your luck is when you play slots because slots are a gambling game that really depends on luck. But you can still get a nice prize from the casino's free spins, but you have to really have some big luck.Indeed there is no risk at all with the free spins because you are not using anything to bet. But usually, those free spins are given to you after you deposit a certain amount and you will also get a certain number of free spins. But for the result, it will depend on your luck.
